meanings.definition: A mild viral disease of cows, causing pustules on the teats and udder.
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the cowpox on the cow's udder.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian treated the cowpox on the teats of the cows.
meanings.sent3: The cow with cowpox tried to milk itself, thinking the pustules were extra teats.
meanings.sent4: The cowpox spread through the herd like wildfire, covering every udder in sight.
meanings.sent5: The pustules from the cowpox made the udder look like a field of tiny volcanoes.

meanings.definition: A virus used in the past to vaccinate against smallpox.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the cowpox virus to develop the smallpox vaccine.
meanings.sent2: The doctor administered the cowpox virus to protect the patient from smallpox.
meanings.sent3: The cowpox virus went on strike, demanding better working conditions inside the body.
meanings.sent4: The cowpox virus acted as a shield, guarding against the invasion of smallpox.
meanings.sent5: The cowpox virus was the hero that saved many lives from the deadly smallpox.
